pages.text: When holding [shift] a detailed tooltip shows all stats of an armor. $(br) $(li) $(l:armor_stats#power_type)Power$(/l) $(li) $(l:armor_stats#power_type)PowerType$(/l) $(li) $(l:armor_stats#durability_toughness)Durability $(li) $(l:armor_stats#durability_toughness)Toughness$(/l) $(li) $(l:armor_stats#armor)Armor-Values$(/l) $(li) $(l:armor_stats#armor)Penetration-Resistance$(/l)

pages.title: Bonus Effects
pages.text: The following bonus effects can be provided by armors:$(br) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#move_mine_speed)Move speed$(/l)$(li)$(l:armor_stats#move_mine_speed)Mining speed$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#fall_damage)Fall damage$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#fall_damage)Fall height$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#accuracy)Gun accuracy$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#accuracy)Extra Hearts$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#nightvision)Nightvision$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#nightvision)Step-Assist$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#oxygen)Oxygen Gear$(/l) $(li)$(l:armor_stats#cooling)Cooling System$(/l)

pages.title: Power & PowerType
pages.text: Power shows the current and maximum amount of power the armor holds. PowerType shows the $(l:armor_mechanics#powered_armors)Power-Type$(/l) and the item used to reload the armor. The reload item is automatically consumed from the players ammo inventory and regular inventory.

pages.title: Durability & Toughness
pages.text: Item Durability and Armor Toughness are vanilla minecraft mechanics. Techguns armors do not get destroyed by reaching 0 durability, see $(l:armor_mechanics)Armor Mechanics$(/l). Otherwise both mechanics work like vanilla.

pages.title: Armor & Penetration
pages.text: Armor Values shows the armor value against each different damage type. TODO: Damage Types Entry. Penetration resistance: TODO finalize damage formula.

pages.title: Move & Mining speed
pages.text: Movement speed bonus increases a players movement speed by the given percentage. Mining speed increases the speed while harvesting a block. $(br)Underwater mining speed bonus is only applied when the player is under water.

pages.title: Fall damage & height
pages.text: Fall damage reduces the damage taken from falling by the given amount. $(br2)Fall height removes the given amount of height from the fall distance and allows to fall higher before taking any damage at all.

pages.title: Accuracy & Hearts
pages.text: Gun accuracy reduces the $(l:weapon_stats#spread)spread$(/l) of guns.$(br2) Extra Hearts increases the player's health points (hearts) by the given amount. Note: 1 Heart in the user interfaces represents 2 health points. 10 Hearts = 20 Health.

pages.title: Nightvision & Step-Assist
pages.text: Nightvision allows the player to activate nightvision with the $(9)$(k:techguns.key.toggleNightvision)$()-key. $(br2)Step-Assist allows the player to toggle step-assist with the $(9)$(k:techguns.key.toggleStepassist)$()-key. While step assist is active a full block height can be walked over without jumping.

pages.title: Knockback Resistance
pages.text: Gives the player a chance to avoid beeing knocked back by damage. If this chance exceeds 100% a player can no longer be knocked back by damage.

pages.title: Oxygen gear
pages.text: Oxygen gear allows the player to breath underwater when oxygen tanks are equipped in the player's back slot (TODO:tg inventory).

pages.title: Cooling System
pages.text: A cooling system automatically extinguishes the player when burning while draining Power from the armor. Also absorbs lava damage at the cost of power.
